channel.title: INtech

item.title: Amazon’s Fire Tablets, Tested, So You Don’t Have To (2024)
item.description: Whether you need a travel-friendly slate or something affordable for the kids, we tested every model to find the right one for every occasion.

item.title: AI's Big Gift to Society Is … Pithy Summaries?
item.description: Companies keep rolling out AI features that boil down various kinds of text. They're making us dumber.
